content: Until the call scheduling is consolidated let me use the FAIR track to give information about the project calls :-)
The next one will be on January 7th 10-11 (ET) // 16-17 (CET)
Details for connection and proposed agenda here
the main topic will be the preparation of the FAIR track
Is there anyone in the meeting?
Steve and I are waiting as well
The meeting has not yet been started
ok there is seems there is an issue with the gtm... because I don't see anyone there
let me stop and restart the session..
great
As agreed yesterday this is the doodle to identify the time slot for the next call
Next call is on Wednesday Feb, 3rd 10-11 am ET // 16-17 CET
for joining this is the zoom link
the meeting is also scheduled in the HL7 calendar (it will be a 1 h call, not 1.5 h as indicated in that calendar)

just sent via email the connection details (gotomeeting) for the next (Wed Feb 10th) FAIRness for FHIR project call.
Let me know if you have not received ...
Hi @Giorgio Cangioli I haven't received that invitation.

Dear All. I have just sent via email (to FHIR4FAIR mailing list) the GoToMeeting connection details for the next (Wed Feb 17th) FAIRness for FHIR project call. Please, let me know if you have not received it. Thank you!

Hi @Alicia Martinez-Garcia , can you check if I am on your mail list since I didn't receive any email. I assume it will be the same time and same conference call info? If not, please forward one to yunweiw@mitre.org. Thanks

Yunwei Wang said:

Hi Alicia Martinez-Garcia , can you check if I am on your mail list since I didn't receive any email. I assume it will be the same time and same conference call info? If not, please forward one to yunweiw@mitre.org. Thanks

Dear Yunwei. Today's meeting is at the same time, but the conference call info is not the same than last meeting. I have just sent the information to yunweiw@mitre.org. Thank you very much for your interest.
Hi Giorgio, did upload last week's slides in Confluence?
I suppose I did .. but let me check...:-)
mmhhh is not there... I'll do it now..
@Matthias Löbe it should be there now..sorry...

This is the doodle for the request of changing the time for the FAIRNess for FHIR calls.

My suggestion is that any change (if any) will be applied after march 28th when the daylight saving times of EU and US will be aligned.
Let’s agree then case by case how to manage the two weeks after march 14th .

The call for this week is confirmed at the regular time 8.30 ET/14.30 CET with the same gotomeeting link
Just heard from the OHDSI community:https://www.ohdsi.org/ohdsi-hl7-collaboration/
Just sent the invitations for the April meetings with the new time slot : each Wed 10-11 EDT // 16-17 CEST.
Let me know if you have not received it
@Giorgio Cangioli I suggest that you update the meeting invite from last week to be a recurrent weekly meeting? Speak later today at 10-11 EDT // 16-17 CEST.

Hi @Ian D Harrow the outlook invitation I sent was a recurring weekly meeting (up to the end of April); do you suggest I send a new invitation including May ? Or are you suggesting I resend the current series ?
@Giorgio Cangioli I will not be able to attend the meeting next Wednesday, April 21st, I will be at the RDA VP17
Thanks @Anupama Gururaj for informing.
A question for everyone: do you suggest to skip or to keep the 21st call ?

..it depends on how many people will be able to join..
It will be focused on IG and FHIR representation
Dear @Giorgio Cangioli . I apologize, I will not be able to attend next meeting on April 21st either.

Giorgio Cangioli said:

A question for everyone: do you suggest to skip or to keep the 21st call ?

I would be able to join! Last week I took some days off so I didn't join the call.

I know that many people will not able to join, but let's have the call and see if we can proceed a little bit..
in the worst case we will have a short call :-)
kind reminder for the today call.. just started :-)

The call of this Wednesday has been cancelled due to the FHIR Connectathon.
I hope however that we can continue to work offline, I’ll try to keep the FHIR IG updated with your contributions.
The call of this Wednesday has been cancelled since the meeting was held yesterday at the HL7 WGM.
this week call will be on Wed June 8th 15.30 CEST // 9.30 EDT // 14.30 GMT+1. (1 h) due to the overlap with the IPS/IPA call (that has been extended to 1,5 h)
Let’s then decide if we should keep this new time also for the future or look for other options.
Dear @Giorgio Cangioli, dear all . Ok, see you next Wed June 8th 15.30 CEST. Regarding the decision to keep this time for the future, for my it's ok. Best.
My calendar says this Weds is June 9th! See you at 14:30 GMT+1!!

Ian D Harrow said:

My calendar says this Weds is June 9th! See you at 14:30 GMT+1!!

Also mine !! :-)
See you on Wed June 9th

The next call will be on Wed 7th same time (3 pm CEST / 9 am EDT).

The plan was to work off line on the findability principles in the
https://confluence.hl7.org/display/SOA/HL7+FHIR+and+FAIR+principles and https://confluence.hl7.org/display/SOA/HL7+FHIR+and+RDA+FAIR+Data+Maturity+Indicators pages and consolidate that part during the call.

Next call tomorrow July 13th 3 pm CEST / 9 am EDT.
The link is the same of last week (let me know if you have not, I'll send you)

same agenda of last week...to continue working on the generale guidance for the findability principles.

I'll not able to run the planned 21st Wed call, two options

  • meet directly on the next Wednesday 28th OR
  • anticipate the call to Tuesday 20th (tomorrow) same time 9 EDT / 15 CEST

In both cases I’d like to kindly invite you to work on the pages:
• https://confluence.hl7.org/display/SOA/FAIR+identifiers
• https://confluence.hl7.org/display/SOA/HL7+FHIR+and+FAIR+principles
• https://confluence.hl7.org/display/SOA/HL7+FHIR+and+RDA+FAIR+Data+Maturity+Indicators
We will have the call tomorrow Tuesday 20th same time 9 EDT / 15 CEST, same link
See video call dates and notes on the wiki: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/SOA/FAIRness+for+FHIR+Conference+Calls
